name_original: Horizon (itch) (spenmas, Gonellicon4, HAZELdoron, JLawless, MonkeyWrenchSoft, koopastroopa)
description:
IMPORTANT: Plays best when downloaded; Sound becomes choppy in web version.

Horizon: You and your shadow share the horizon. Your shadow matches your every move, move too far away from it and your shadow will disappear. Tackle 12 platforming levels while navigating through the shadow and the light. 

CONTROLS:

Spacebar: Jump

Escape: Pause Menu (You can Restart, Skip, Change Volume, Return to menu)

Editor's Note: We wanted to add a story-campaign, CGI cutscenes, and 100 person battle-royale, unfortunately we were strapped for time.
